feed.title: Twitter / jackdanger
feed.subtitle: Twitter updates from Jack Danger Canty / jackdanger.

entry.title: jackdanger: favorite moment from yesterday: Josh Susser introducing himself and thanking me for "my contributions." Made me feel like a damned king.
entry.content: jackdanger: favorite moment from yesterday: Josh Susser introducing himself and thanking me for "my contributions." Made me feel like a damned king.

entry.title: jackdanger: Apparently the Coast Starlight was almost on time today. Then some warning light went off at nearby bridge. Setting up camp in the station
entry.content: jackdanger: Apparently the Coast Starlight was almost on time today. Then some warning light went off at nearby bridge. Setting up camp in the station

entry.title: jackdanger: Bus Scheme is now running live in the wild. Going to port my home page to it on the train ride home tomorrow.
entry.content: jackdanger: Bus Scheme is now running live in the wild. Going to port my home page to it on the train ride home tomorrow.

entry.title: jackdanger: @technomancy fair enough - but I did just fix the xml tests: http://tinyurl.com/4cu6xg (yippee!)
entry.content: jackdanger: @technomancy fair enough - but I did just fix the xml tests: http://tinyurl.com/4cu6xg (yippee!)

entry.title: jackdanger: sitting in RailsConf hallway. trying to figure out how scheme in Ruby does XML.
entry.content: jackdanger: sitting in RailsConf hallway. trying to figure out how scheme in Ruby does XML.

entry.title: jackdanger: best experience from the conf so far: Phil Hagelberg pretending I'm not an idiot as he teaches me Bus-Scheme. http://technomancy.us/98
entry.content: jackdanger: best experience from the conf so far: Phil Hagelberg pretending I'm not an idiot as he teaches me Bus-Scheme. http://technomancy.us/98

entry.title: jackdanger: free beer at the lucky lab. I'm paying for a while :-)
entry.content: jackdanger: free beer at the lucky lab. I'm paying for a while :-)

entry.title: jackdanger: hacking on an experimental project that has a 0% chance of success. I'm wading in deep, deep water.
entry.content: jackdanger: hacking on an experimental project that has a 0% chance of success. I'm wading in deep, deep water.

entry.title: jackdanger: Chillin' at the caboosery. Looking forward to lunch with new or old friends.
entry.content: jackdanger: Chillin' at the caboosery. Looking forward to lunch with new or old friends.

entry.title: jackdanger: loved th joyent-sponsored free beer night. In fact, I can't quite see straight. Thanks accelerators! http://joyent.com/accelerator
entry.content: jackdanger: loved th joyent-sponsored free beer night. In fact, I can't quite see straight. Thanks accelerators! http://joyent.com/accelerator

entry.title: jackdanger: @defunkt was said dude wearing a blue dress shirt and dockers? If so he probably works in Redmond. Hard to believe somebody paid for one.
entry.content: jackdanger: @defunkt was said dude wearing a blue dress shirt and dockers? If so he probably works in Redmond. Hard to believe somebody paid for one.

entry.title: jackdanger: met alex vollmer and mike mondragon. They seem to be doing things with gems and rubinius that are rarely tried.
entry.content: jackdanger: met alex vollmer and mike mondragon. They seem to be doing things with gems and rubinius that are rarely tried.

entry.title: jackdanger: @teflonted I'll take you out to a pdx bar to celebrate a safe landing.
entry.content: jackdanger: @teflonted I'll take you out to a pdx bar to celebrate a safe landing.

entry.title: jackdanger: 618 NW Glisan it is then.
entry.content: jackdanger: 618 NW Glisan it is then.

entry.title: jackdanger: got to pdx, got lunch, and then suddenly realized I have no idea where the ENTP hq/caboosery is. Can anybody help a fool out?
entry.content: jackdanger: got to pdx, got lunch, and then suddenly realized I have no idea where the ENTP hq/caboosery is. Can anybody help a fool out?

entry.title: jackdanger: about to arrive in pdx. Amtrak was worth every cent. some of my other cents are about to go to Chipotle in exchange for lunch.
entry.content: jackdanger: about to arrive in pdx. Amtrak was worth every cent. some of my other cents are about to go to Chipotle in exchange for lunch.

entry.title: jackdanger: @danbenjamin all the seats with power outlets on my train are accupied by people reading AWDWR.
entry.content: jackdanger: @danbenjamin all the seats with power outlets on my train are accupied by people reading AWDWR.

entry.title: jackdanger: @technoweenie more coming. fun people often show up late. lazy people show up late as well. I come to represent group #2.
entry.content: jackdanger: @technoweenie more coming. fun people often show up late. lazy people show up late as well. I come to represent group #2.

entry.title: jackdanger: I'm going to caboose conf on a fucking TRAIN. That plus the Ruby-themed t-shirt I'm wearing makes me THEMATICALLY CONSISTENT BITCH.
entry.content: jackdanger: I'm going to caboose conf on a fucking TRAIN. That plus the Ruby-themed t-shirt I'm wearing makes me THEMATICALLY CONSISTENT BITCH.

entry.title: jackdanger: At Seattle train station. Hacking in terminal. Gonna hack in the dining car soon.
entry.content: jackdanger: At Seattle train station. Hacking in terminal. Gonna hack in the dining car soon.
